content.gatha1: ‘‘Vinataṃ sajjitaṃ (syā.), tiyantaṃ (pī.) dhanumādāya, bhakkhatthāya cariṃ ahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Cāpaṃ tattheva nikkhippa, sire katvāna añjaliṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
content.gathalast: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā paṃsukūlasaññako thero imā gāthāyo
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mama aññataro sisso, sissānaṃ so kathesi me;
content.gathalast: Sutvāna te etamatthaṃ, ārocesuṃ mamaṃ tadā.
Tassānuvattati jano, lābho amhaṃ na vijjatina hessatina hessati .
Vāyasānaṃ yathā khīraṃ, dullabho lokanāyakodullabhā lokanāyakādullabhaṃ lokanāyakaṃdullabhaṃ lokanāyakaṃdullabhaṃ lokanāyakaṃ .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Buddho loke samuppanno, cakkhuṃ lacchāma no bhavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Te jaṭā bhārabharitā, nikkhamuṃ vipinā tadā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā buddhasaññako thero imā gāthāyo
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ogayha yaṃ ogayhāhaṃ (sī. syā. pī.) pokkharaṇiṃ, nānākuñjarasevitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Uddharāmi bhisaṃ tattha, ghāsahetuasanahetu ahaṃ tadā.
Madhuṃ bhisehi savati, khīraṃ sappiṃ muḷālibhi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Sukhī hotu hohi (sī. syā. pī. ka.) mahāpuñña, gati tuyhaṃ samijjhatu;
content.gathalast: Sohaṃ nisinnako santo, tattha kālaṅkato ahuṃ.
Kaḷevaraṃ me patitaṃ, devaloke ramiṃ ahaṃ.
Sāyapātaṃsāyaṃ pātaṃsāyaṃ pātaṃ upaṭṭhanti, bhisadānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, bhisadānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā bhisadāyako thero imā gāthāyo
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nāhaṃ suṇomi sambuddhaṃ, napi me koci saṃsatibhāsatisāsatisāsati ;
content.gathalast: Uddharanto bahū satte, deseti amataṃ padaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Tuvaṃ satthā ca ketu ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Parāyanoparāyaṇoparāyaṇo patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Sakkā theve have (sī. pī.) bhave (syā. ka.) kusaggena, pametuṃ sāgaruttamesāgaruttamosāgaruttamosāgaruttamo ;
content.gathalast: Natveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave.
Natveva tava sabbaññu, sīlaṃ sakkā pametave.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, phalaṃ ñāṇassa thomane.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā ñāṇathaviko thero imā gāthāyo
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, mahābrahmā idhāgato;
content.gathalast: Virocesi disā sabbā, udayaṃ sūriyo yathā.
content.gatha2: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayaṃ;
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Namhi devo na gandhabbo, namhināpi sakko purindado;
content.gathalast: Brahmabhāvo ca me natthi, etesaṃ uttamo ahaṃ.
Khippaṃ paggayha taṃ sabbaṃ, upetvā lokanāyakaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Eteneva upāyena, saṃsarissati so bhave yoniso (syā. pī.);
content.gathalast: Sabbattha pūjito hutvā, devatte atha mānuse.
Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, yamhi gabbhe vasāmahaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā candanamāliyo thero imā gāthāyo
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā dhātupūjako thero imā gāthāyo
content.gathalast: Tattha me caṅkamo āsi, amanussehi māpito.
Sabbe sissā samāgantvā, etamatthaṃ pucchiṃsu maṃetamatthamapucchu maṃetamattaṃ apucchiṃsuetamattaṃ apucchiṃsu .
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Pulinena kato thūpokato thūpe , yaṃ tvaṃ devadevaṃdevaṃ massati;
content.gathalast: Mayampi ñātumicchāma, puṭṭho ācikkha no tuvaṃ’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Niddiṭṭhā nuniddiṭṭhā noniddiṭṭhā nodiṭṭhāno vo mantapade, cakkhumanto mahāyasā;
content.gathalast: Te kho ahaṃ namassāmi, buddhaseṭṭhe mahāyase’.
Na tesaṃ jāṇu nadati, sandhisaddo na suyyati.
Paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ, buddhānaṃ esa dhammatā.
Nevukkaṃsenti attānaṃ, no ca vambhenti pāṇinaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Īdisā te mahānāgā, atulā ca te (syā. ka.) mahāyasā;
content.gathalast: Sabbe sissā samāgantvā, āgacchuṃ mama santike.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Balañca vata me khīṇaṃ, byādhinābyādhitobyādhitobyādhitobyādhito paramena taṃ;
content.gathalast: Mā vo pamattā ahutthaahuvattha , khaṇo vo paṭipādito’.
Duggatiṃ nābhijānāmi, uppādassa idaṃ phalaṃpulinapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā pulinuppādako thero imā gāthāyo
content.gathalast: Sukhaṃ me tādisaṃ natthi, phuṭṭhe pādatale yathā.
Ayañca kacchapo rājā, tāresi mama paññavā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā taraṇiyo thero imā gāthāyo
content.gathalast: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
Ānando nāma nāmena ānando nāmupaṭṭhāko (syā.), upaṭṭhissatimaṃ jinaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Akariṃ ānantariyaṃ akariṃ nantariyañca (syā. ka.), ghātayiṃ duṭṭhamānaso;
content.gathalast: Na puno addasaṃ vīraṃ, sumedhaṃ narapuṅgavaṃ.
Upemi buddhaṃ tikkhattuṃ, rattiyā divasassa ca.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tadā disvā muni āha, ciraṃ dhammarucīti maṃ;
content.gathalast: Ahamajjasupekkhanaṃ vata, tava passāmi nirupamaṃ viggahaṃnirūpamaggahaṃ .
Suciraṃ amalaṃ visodhitaṃ, nayanaṃ ñāṇamayaṃ mahāmune.
Punarajjasamāgato tayā, na hi nassanti katāni gotama.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā dhammaruciyo thero imā gāthāyo
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno;
content.gathalast: Tassa kammaṃ saritvāna, sitaṃ pātukariṃ ahaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Anokāsaṃ na passāmi, yattha yaṃ taṃ (syā. pī. ka.) puññaṃ vipaccati;
content.gathalast: Devaloke manusse vā, okāsova na sammati.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
content.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā sālamaṇḍapiyo thero imā gāthāyo
content.gathalast: Satāni dve honti gāthā, ūnavīsatimeva ca.
